CRAN-RELEASE-CHECKLIST

Source: .github/CRAN-RELEASE-CHECKLIST.md

Pre-submission Steps

1. Update version number

2. Update documentation

3. Run checks

# Local check
devtools::check()

# Windows
devtools::check_win_devel()
devtools::check_win_release()

# Multiple platforms
rhub::rhub_check()

# Spell check
spelling::spell_check_package()
spelling::update_wordlist()

# URL check
urlchecker::url_check()

4. Build and submit

# Build package
devtools::build()

# Submit to CRAN
devtools::release()

5. Post-acceptance

# Tag release
usethis::use_github_release()

On this page
